title: Im about to send my N 400 for naturalization
question: i qualify to apply for my citizenship, because im married to us citizen for three yrs, live here in the us for three yrs and permanent resident for almost 3 yrs. So my questions is should i wait untill i have completed my 3 yrs as permanent resident which is only 2 months ahead or can i send my N 400 2 months before the 3 yr term as permant resident?
answers:
2 years and 9 months after you received the greencard (anniversary of the greencard) you can file for the citizenship based on marriage. However, make sure you put a lot of proof on the bona fide of the marriage in the package.
